ygData.subject: You shall not evade me Sylly!
ygData.msgSnippet: When it was merely an Ice Giant, I was not too worried  but about an hour later... I danced with a dragon! Lady Voxx called me by name, How could I
ygData.messageBody:
When it was merely an Ice Giant,
I was not too worried <heh>
but about an hour later...

I danced with a dragon!

"Lady Voxx called me by name,
How could I refuse such fame?
So into her lair, I came.

Amazing to see, just her and me,
I played my drum and thought to run.
But run to where? Not knowing this lair,
I chose instead to stand and stare.

She was big and blue,
Truly an astounding view.
I lasted several rounds,
but alas - too few."

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of 42 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. server reset yesterday afternoon (?) so my guild (The Pantheon on
Innoruuk server) took a shot at Voxxy-woxxy. And she went down! 2 hammers,
a crys spear, a mask. We tried to pull her from the lair but she didn't
want to budge. She summoned me to her side. It was very amazing being the
only one in the Lair right next to her. I scampered around and I think I
got some screen shots. I did not feel like running into the pit so I kinda
tried to hide and hope the others would come get her but after a few rounds,
she dispatched me to Rivervale. Later, we were dividing up the loot and
just finished when the zone crashed again (and re-popped.) Had it not been
3am, we would have killed her again. Instead, GM and Guides came and
cleared lair so we could do CR for those who got smooshed in the re-pop.
